homePageP1: Our company has been operating under the name “Klimatex” since 2004. The main field of activity is the design and installation of heating systems, ventilation, air conditioning, and water systems. In addition, Klimatex company manufactures air ducts and diffusers and implements the installation of automatic control systems in all the aforementioned fields. Klimatex company cooperates with many leading brands in the world according to its field of activity. Year-round service is provided for all work performed. As Klimatex, our main goal is to ensure professional activity in our country in the fields listed above and to justify the trust of users.
homePageP2: Providing high-level service to customers in the design and construction of ventilation, heating and cooling systems, fire safety systems, boiler rooms, collector-drainage networks.
